class Ods_ActivityInstance_object(BaseOEAModule):
    def __init__(self, source_folder='ODSActivityInstance', pseudonymize = True):
        BaseOEAModule.__init__(self, source_folder, pseudonymize)

        
        self.schemas['CompassODSActivityInstance'] = [
                                        ['SKActivityInstance', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['BKActivityInstance', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SubjectCode', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ActivityCode', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Start', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Finish', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ManagingCompassPersonId', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CoveringCompassPersonId', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CampusImportIdentifier', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CampusId', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['IsCurrent', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['DioceseId', 'string', 'no-op']
        ]
                                           

    def ingest(self):
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'CompassODSActivityInstance', self.schemas['CompassODSActivityInstance'], None, 'SKStudent')


ods_activityinstance_object = Ods_ActivityInstance_object()
